Title: The Flintstones
Writer: Tom S. Parker, Jim Jennewein, Steven E. de Souza
Actors: John Goodman, Elizabeth Perkins, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell
Plot: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.
Production: Universal Pictures, Hanna-Barbera Productions, Amblin Entertainment
